import classnames from "classnames"; const Step = (number, name, icon, active, completed) => { const unstarted = !active && !completed const nameStyle = classnames('ml-4 text-sm', { "text-gray-200": completed, "font-medium": completed, "text-gray-400": unstarted, "font-medium": unstarted, }) return (
  • {/* */} 01 {name}
    • ) } export const Steps = () => (
      {/* */} {/* */}
    1. Approve
